resources.string: The up threshold is given in % and has to be between 0 and 100.
The down threshold is given in % and has to be between 0 and 100.
The up threshold has to be bigger than the down threshold.
The threshold has to be a integer number.
Minimal frequency needs to be smaller than the maximal.
Skript, das nach einer Änderung, ausgeführt wird. Bei unsicherheit leer lassen.
